title: Taxify
description: Tax Education Made Simple and Fun. Taxify is a tax education platform that simplifies the complexities of tax laws and regulations.
features: Built for small businesses : Helps users manage taxes and understand economic systems without stress or high costs.
Reduces tax overpayment : Empowers users with the knowledge to handle basic tasks without relying on costly CAs.
Gamified learning : Delivers daily bite-sized lessons through interactive, real-world tax and finance scenarios.
Earn as you learn : Users score points for making smart financial decisions, reinforcing habits that lead to real-life savings.
Powered by RAG models : Always up to date with the latest insights from trusted sources like the Income Tax Department.
Jargon-free simplicity : Focuses on actionable steps rather than complex terms, making finance approachable and practical.
Daily decision-making tool : Encourages consistent engagement, helps cut CA dependency, and builds financial confidence.

title: EduVoice
description: EduVoice is an innovative educational platform that leverages AI to enhance the learning experience. It provides a comprehensive solution for students and educators, combining traditional teaching methods with modern technology.
features: AI-Driven Content Interpretation: Analyzes static presentations (PDFs, PPTs) to extract and simplify key topics for learners.
Multimedia Integration: Enhances learning materials with voice-overs and audio-visual elements, making lessons immersive and engaging.
Generative AI Models: Produces human-like voice outputs and contextual explanations for complex subjects.
Text-to-Speech (TTS) Technology: Converts written content into natural-sounding speech, improving accessibility and comprehension.
Interactive Chatbot Assistance: Real-time chatbot provides instant support by answering questions, promoting an engaging learning atmosphere.
Personalized Learning Experience: Tailors content and explanations to individual learning preferences, supporting self-paced study.
Active Learning and Participation: Encourages student engagement via interactive channels and real-time discussions.
Comprehensive Topic Coverage: Uses AI to identify and elaborate on essential topics for better understanding and retention.
Real-Time Communication Platform: Integrates a Discord-style server for collaborative learning, enabling discussion and knowledge sharing.
Bridging Traditional and Modern Education: Combines conventional educational methods with advanced AI for enhanced learning.
Multi-Channel Access: Offers text, voice, and multimedia learning modalities, accommodating diverse learner needs.
Immersive and Fun Learning: Turns learning into an enjoyable process with interactive and engaging content.
Focus on Complex Subjects: Simplifies challenging topics, making them easier to understand and memorize.
Self-Paced Learning: Allows learners to study at their convenience while still receiving detailed explanations.
Educational Technology Integration: Incorporates cutting-edge tools to create a transformative and futuristic educational experience.
Multi-Purpose Application: Suitable for students, educators, and professionals, making it versatile for various training contexts.

title: HashTag City
description: Hashtag city is a travels startup of Nagpur city, The website uses libraries like GSAP and Scroll Trigger to provide a more lively and animated look to the website
features: Built with React.js – Modular, component-driven architecture for maintainable and scalable code.
GSAP-Powered Animations – Smooth, high-performance animations throughout the site.
ScrollTrigger Integration – Triggers animations based on scroll position for an immersive browsing experience.
Scroll-Based Effects – Includes parallax scrolling, horizontal sections, and animated reveals.
GSAP Timelines – Controls complex animation sequences with fine-tuned timing and flow.
Animated Hero Section – Visually engaging landing with dynamic text and image motion.
Responsive Design – Fully optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
Performance Optimization – Uses React refs, useLayoutEffect, and lazy loading for fast performance.
Tailwind CSS Styling – Clean, utility-first design system for rapid UI development.
Interactive User Experience – Engaging visual storytelling through motion and interactivity.

title: Digital Swag
description: A Canvas based Digital Swag application that allows users to create and customize their own swag items.
features: Canvas-based design tool for creating custom swag items.
Real-time preview of designs on various swag items.
Ability to upload images and download designs.
Integration with HackSphere 2.0 website for event-specific swag items.

title: Servico
description: Web application that enables users to search for daily life services at and order them at doorsteps just with a click.
features: User-friendly interface for searching and ordering services.
Real-time updates on service availability.
Secure payment gateway integration.
Admin panel for managing services and users.
Responsive design for mobile and desktop.

title: Chat Application
description: Socket-io based Chat application with real time updates and latest functionalities like Reactions Replies, etc
features: Real-time chat functionality using Socket.io.
User authentication and profile management.
Message reactions and replies for enhanced communication.
Responsive design for mobile and desktop.
